blogs.title: THE JOURNEY OF THE MARMABILL
blogs.body: For those spending time at home, looking for a cozy adventure or bedtime story for kids, we offer this imaginative rhyming picture book, read by the author, Daniel Errico.
blogs.author: Aaniel Errico

blogs.title: GEMMA
blogs.body: Gemma is a middle grade novel that follows a curious explorer and her ring-tailed lemur, Milo, as they hunt for the “most greatest treasure in the world”. Solving riddles, battling a bell-wearing jaguar.
blogs.author: Daniel Errico

blogs.title: THE GUARDIANS OF LORE
blogs.body: While drawing in class at Stagwood School, 12-year old Cal sees a frog staring at him through the window. Stranger than that, is the fact that this frog happens to be wearing glasses. Cal and his best friend, Soy,
blogs.author: Daniel Errico

blogs.title: HE PARTICULAR WAY OF THE ODD MS. MCKAY
blogs.body: This quirky tale is about our most infamous character of all. If you don’t have a soufflé-baking, trumpet-blaring, sleigh-riding friend, then maybe it’s time that you met Ms. McKay. Told as a monorhyme poem.
blogs.author: Daniel Errico
